entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
